channel.title: Data in Motion on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Data in Motion on FinanClub

item.title: CFLT
item.description: score:85 Chances: Confluent has rallied 50% in February, fueled by better-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings and an optimistic outlook. Rising data streaming adoption can drive solid growth for Confluent. Confluent, Inc. creates a data infrastructure platform focused on data in motion, which is a rapidly growing market.
